meanings: live, (생계를 유지하다) make[earn] a living, earn a livelihood
B형에 관련된 표현 You are the type who lives day to day.

vlive.korean: 그냥 영원히 살아가는 그런 영상을 지닌 남자? Like an immortal man? 듣기 View video PARK JI HOON : 박지훈 PARK JI HOON 1st MINI ALBUM [O’CLOCK] SHOWCASE
그냥 내가 아는 거는 살아가는 방법뿐입니다. All I know is just to live. 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : #밤황치열시 #part.2 #DJ황치열
vlive.english: All I know is just to live.

vlive.korean: 인간만 살아가는 곳이 아니잖아요. This place isn't only for humans to live. 듣기 View video tvN : 빵과 집사, 고양이 - 집사인 게 자랑3 3회
vlive.english: This place isn't only for humans to live.

vlive.korean: 치열하게 살아가는 동물이었어 - 동물이었어요? I was an animal who live fiercely. - You were? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2018 - EP.56
vlive.english: I was an animal who live fiercely. - You were?

vlive.korean: 슬픔을 등에 지고 살아가는 바보 - 그렇지! "Hearing my sadness on my back, I live like a fool." - Yes! 듣기 View video SF9 : go back in time
vlive.english: "Hearing my sadness on my back, I live like a fool." - Yes!

examples.korean: The goal of life is living in agreement with nature. (Zeno) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자연과 조화롭게 살아가는 것이 삶의 목적이다. (제노, 인생명언) 명언/속담
